titleStmt.title: The iudgement of Doctor Reignolds concerning episcopacy, whether it be Gods ordinance. Expressed in a letter to Sir Francis Knovvls, concerning Doctor Bancrofts sermon at Pauls-Crosse, the ninth of February, 1588. In the Parliament time.
titleStmt.author: Rainolds, John, 1549-1607.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
